data.title: Films & Events
data.text:
'KIDS AND CLIMATE SCREENING' WFYI LIVE AT THE KAN-KAN

Free tickets

'SCOTT PILGRIM VS THE WORLD' : PART OF THE BOOK TO FILM CLUB PRESENTED WITH INDY READS

Join us for a free book club and discussion before the film.

Buy tickets

SINS OF THE FLESH: FOUR RARE FILMS BY CURT MCDOWELL

• Length 120 min

Buy tickets

INDIANAPOLIS BLACK DOCUMENTARY FILM FESTIVAL

Buy tickets

CORK-CORK AT THE KAN-KAN: A WINE AND FILM SERIES - 'MIDNIGHT IN PARIS'

Once a month, we will be pairing a film with a special pre-film wine mini-class taught by Jan Bugher, Certified Sommelier.

Buy tickets

BLACK IN AMERICA - BIOGRAPHY SERIES : 'TONI MORRISON: THE PIECES I AM'

This artful and intimate meditation on the legendary storyteller examines her life, her works and the powerful themes she has confronted throughout her literary career.

Buy tickets

SUMMER CAMP : THE PRINCESS AND THE FROG (2009)

A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

Buy tickets

'HOW TO GET AWAY WITH GREENWASHING' : SNEAK PEEK

Dir. by Samuel Pigott, Benjamin Espinoza

Free tickets

AN OZU EVENING : 'TOKYO STORY'

Rated NR • Length 136 min

Dir. by Yasujirô Ozu

An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

Buy tickets

'FRIDAY THE 13TH: PART III' IN 3D WITH VANITY REX

Join us for FRIDAY THE 13TH: PART III (1982) in 3D with host, Vanity Rex, and special guests Bunny Beaumont and Holy Gail (who may or may not also be in 3D) who will be providing commentary, jokes, and trivia!

Buy tickets

A/V CLUB THEATER SPECIAL: LET MY PUPPETS COME (1976)

$3 select drafts and well drinks.

Buy tickets

AN OZU EVENING : 'AN AUTUMN AFTERNOON'

Rated NR • Length 113 min

Dir. by Yasujirô Ozu

An aging widower arranges a marriage for his only daughter.

Buy tickets

CORK-CORK AT THE KAN-KAN: A WINE AND FILM SERIES - 'THE SECRET OF SANTA VITTORIA'

Once a month, we will be pairing a film with a special pre-film wine mini-class taught by Jan Bugher, Certified Sommelier.

Buy tickets

'THE SECRET OF SANTA VITTORIA (1969)' - FILM ONLY

During WWII in Italy, a wine-producing village hides a million bottles from the Germans.

Buy tickets

'THE CABINET OF DR. CALIGARI' WITH VANITY REX

Join us for THE CABINET OF DR. CALIGARI (1920) with host, Vanity Rex, and special guests Wife Patrol + Friends who will be providing commentary, jokes, and trivia!

Buy tickets

'SCIENCE, SEX AND THE LADIES' FOLLOWED BY FILMMAKER Q&A

Dir. by Barnaby Aaron, Charles Borowicz, Trisha Borowicz

Buy tickets

CORK-CORK AT THE KAN-KAN: A WINE AND FILM SERIES - 'THE SILENCE OF THE LAMBS'

Once a month, we will be pairing a film with a special pre-film wine mini-class taught by Jan Bugher, Certified Sommelier.

Buy tickets

'THE SILENCE OF THE LAMBS (1991)' - FILM ONLY

A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Buy tickets

TALES OF THE FOUR SEASONS : 'A TALE OF AUTUMN (1998)'

A widow's best friend tries to find her a new husband, but the ad posted in the newspaper attracts more than one possibility.

Buy tickets

TALES OF THE FOUR SEASONS : 'A TALE OF WINTER (1994)'

Five years after losing touch with a summer fling, a woman has difficulty choosing between her two suitors.

Buy tickets
